languages.text: Таков конец хроники несостоявшейся экспедиции в глубины Зева. В мудрости своей мо{mf|й|я} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} смилостивил{mf|ся|ась} над своими верными слугами и уберег{mf||ла} их от ужасов бушующего Имматериума. Какие бы скорби не ждали нас тут, в Просторе Коронус, мы встретим их с честью, а не сгинем в кипящих Эмпиреях. Слава Императору!

traits.locale_text: Таков конец хроники несостоявшейся экспедиции в глубины Зева. В мудрости своей мо{mf|й|я} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} смилостивил{mf|ся|ась} над своими верными слугами и уберег{mf||ла} их от ужасов бушующего Имматериума. Какие бы скорби не ждали нас тут, в Просторе Коронус, мы встретим их с честью, а не сгинем в кипящем не-реальности. Слава Императору!

languages.text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!
languages.original_text: Таков конец хроники несостоявшейся экспедиции в глубины Зева. В мудрости своей мо{mf|й|я} благословенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} смилостивил{mf|ся|ась} над своими верными слугами и уберег{mf||ла} их от ужасов бушующего Имматериума. Какие бы скорби не ждали нас тут, в Просторе Коронус, мы встретим их с честью, а не сгинем в кипящих Эмпиреях. Слава Императору!

traits.locale_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honor, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honor, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honor, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

languages.text: Así termina la crónica de la expedición abortada a las profundidades de las Fauces. Nuestr{mf|o|a} bendit{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, haciendo gala de su sabiduría, se compadeció de sus fieles siervos y nos escudó de los furiosos horrores del Inmaterio. No sabemos qué clase de dilemas nos esperan en la Extensión de Koronus, pero les haremos frente con honor en vez de morir en el turbulento Empíreo. ¡Gloria al Emperador!
languages.original_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

traits.locale_text: Así termina la crónica de la expedición abortada a las profundidades de las Fauces. Nuestr{mf|o|a} bendit{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, haciendo gala de su sabiduría, se compadeció de sus fieles siervos y nos escudó de los furiosos horrores del Inmaterio. No sabemos qué clase de dilemas nos esperan en la Extensión de Koronus, pero les haremos frente con honor en vez de morir en el turbulento Empíreo. ¡Gloria al Emperador!

languages.text: 于是，对“巨口”的远征就这样中止了。远见卓识的{mf|舰长大人|舰长大人}怜悯{mf|他|她}忠诚的仆人们，保护他们免受亚空间中汹涌的恐怖之物所害。无论科罗努斯扩区有怎样的磨难在等着我们，我们都将心怀荣耀地面对，不会落得在至高天中身死的下场。荣耀归于帝皇！
languages.original_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

traits.locale_text: 于是，对“巨口”的远征就这样中止了。远见卓识的{mf|舰长大人|舰长大人}怜悯{mf|他|她}忠诚的仆人们，保护他们免受亚空间中汹涌的恐怖之物所害。无论科罗努斯星域有怎样的磨难在等着我们，我们都将心怀荣耀地面对，不会落得在至高天中身死的下场。荣耀归于帝皇！

languages.text: これにて、マウの深部を目指して失敗した探査記録は終わりとなる。あのお方の知恵で、我々の祝福された主人はその忠実なる従者達を憐れみ、荒れ狂う非物質世界の恐怖から守ってくださった。ここコロヌス・エクスパンスでどんな試練が待っていようと、我々は名誉を胸に立ち向かい、荒れ狂うエンピリアンで滅びることはないだろう。皇帝に栄光あれ！
languages.original_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

traits.locale_text: これにて、マウの深部を目指して失敗した探査記録は終わりとなる。あのお方の知恵で、我々の祝福された主人はその忠実なる従者達を憐れみ、荒れ狂う非物質世界の恐怖から守ってくださった。ここコロヌス・エクスパンスでどんな試練が待っていようと、我々は名誉を胸に立ち向かい、荒れ狂うエンピリアンで滅びることはないだろう。皇帝に栄光あれ！

languages.text: So endet die Chronik der gescheiterten Expedition in die Tiefen des Schlundes. In seiner Weisheit hatte unser gesegneter Herr Erbarmen mit seinen treuen Dienern und schützte sie vor den Schrecken des wütenden Immateriums. Was auch immer für Drangsale uns hier in der Koronus-Ausdehnung erwarten, wir werden ihnen mit Ehre begegnen und nicht im wütenden Empyrean untergehen. Ruhm dem Imperator!
languages.original_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

languages.text: Ainsi s'achève la chronique de l'expédition avortée dans les profondeurs de la Gueule. Dans son infinie sagesse, notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|loué soit-il|louée soit-elle}, a fait preuve de clémence envers ses fidèles serviteurs et les a épargnés des horreurs de l'Immaterium déchaîné. Quelles que soient les péripéties qui nous attendent dans les Étendues de Koronus, nous les affronterons avec honneur au lieu de périr dans les méandres de l'Empyrée. Gloire à l'Empereur !
languages.original_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

traits.locale_text: Ainsi s'achève la chronique de l'expédition avortée dans les profondeurs de la Gueule. Dans son infinie sagesse, notre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|loué soit-il|louée soit-elle}, a fait preuve de clémence envers ses fidèles serviteurs et les a épargnés des horreurs de l'Immaterium déchaîné. Quelles que soient les péripéties qui nous attendent dans les Étendues de Koronus, nous les affronterons avec honneur au lieu de périr dans les méandres de l'Empyrée. Gloire à l'Empereur !

languages.text: Ağız'ın derinliklerine yapılacak, başlamadan biten seferin kayıtları da böylece sona eriyor. Kutsanmış {mf|lordumuz|leydimiz}, yüce iradesiyle sadık hizmetkârlarına merhamet etti ve onları Tindiyar'ın kestirilemez dehşetlerinden korudu. Bizi burada, Koronus Enginliği'nde nasıl sıkıntılar bekliyor olursa olsun şerefimizle göğüs gerecek ve Gök Diyar'ın çalkantıları içinde yok olmayacağız. İmparator çok yaşa!
languages.original_text: So ends the chronicle of the abortive expedition into the depths of the Maw. In {mf|his|her} wisdom, our blessed {mf|lord|lady} took mercy on {mf|his|her} loyal servants and shielded them from the horrors of the raging Immaterium. Whatever tribulations await us here in the Koronus Expanse, we will meet them with honour, and not perish in the roiling Empyrean. Glory to the Emperor!

traits.locale_text: Ağız'ın derinliklerine yapılan sonuçsuz keşif yolculuğunun kayıtları bu şekilde sonlanıyor. Kutsanmış {mf|lordumuz|leydimiz}, yüce iradesiyle sadık hizmetkârlarına merhamet gösterdi ve onları Tindiyar'ın kestirilemez dehşetlerinden korudu. Bizi burada, Koronus Enginliği'nde nasıl sıkıntılar bekliyor olursa olsun onurumuzla göğüs gerecek ve Gök Diyar'ın çalkantıları içinde yok olmayacağız. İmparator çok yaşa!
